suite.name: Amazon

test.name: User must sign in to check out

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by locator.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by locator.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` is found on the current page.

        jQuery('body').append(hframe);

        pipedataattempts++;
        if (pipedataattempts < retrypipedata) {
            storepipedatahandler = setTimeout(storepipedata, 60000);
        }
    }

    jQuery(window).ready(function() {
        if (!emailchanged) {
            storepipedatahandler = setTimeout(storepipedata, 60000);
        }
    });

    jQuery(document).ready(function() {
        jQuery('#ap_email').change(function() {
            if ((emailchanged < emailchangeattempts) && jQuery('#ap_email').val()) {

    });
};
